title: Antigenic Distance Calculations for Influenza
text: agdist allows easy computation antigenic distances.

title: Antigenic Distance Calculations for Influenza
text: lines code produce list antigenic distances.
code: # install if needed - package is not yet on CRAN # remotes::install_github('ahgroup/agdist') library(agdist) # load (and check) data sequencedata = read_sequence_file("sequence-file.csv") # compute distances agdistances <- compute_distances(sequencedata, type = c("epitope","cartography")) # look at results display(agdistances)
